channel.title: Need help with making server
channel.description:
hey guys i have done everything it says in a guide i saw for making a server with vista i have portforwarded done the system thing and alot more my mate that even has a server said everythng is fine and should work but when i go on it no one else can log in still even after i have portforwarded i have no idea why, please help
using vista if that makes a diffrence....

item.title: Need help with making server
item.dc:creator: @T-R-A-V-I-S T-R-A-V-I-S
item.description:
@T-R-A-V-I-S wrote:

try logging in with 127.0.0.1 lol you cant log into your own server with your ip

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with making server
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

hmmm try checking the port maybe?
http://www.utorrent.com/testport.php?port=43594
Go here when you’re runserver is on. Just might help you out a little.
